mapper.insert: INSERT INTO etp_infor(etp_no, delegator_name, etp_id, etp_pass, etp_email,etp_kind, etp_tel, etp_registration_num, etp_name) <<<<<<< HEAD values(/'#{delegator_name},#{etp_id},#{etp_pass},#{etp_email},#{etp_kind},#{etp_tel},#{etp_registration_num},#{etp_name}) ======= values(2, #{delegator_name},#{etp_id},#{etp_pass},#{etp_email},#{etp_kind},#{etp_tel},#{etp_registration_num},#{etp_name}) >>>>>>> branch 'master' of https://github.com/JoonKyuPark/KostaProject
